name: Onion-Cheese Custard Tartlets
author: Anonymous
summary: Crescent dough in mini muffin cups forms a flaky crust that holds a creamy appetizer filling.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury® refrigerated crescent dinner rolls or Pillsbury® Crescent Recipe Creations™ refrigerated flaky dough sheet
directions: If using crescent rolls: Unroll dough into 1 large rectangle on work surface
Press into 12x9-inch rectangle, firmly pressing perforations to seal
If using dough sheet: Unroll dough on work surface
Gently press squares into 12 ungreased mini muffin cups, shaping edges to form rims 1/4 inch high
Spoon cheese evenly into dough-lined cups
Top each with onions and pimientos
In small bowl, beat egg and whipping cream with wire whisk or fork until blended
Spoon slightly less than 1 tablespoon mixture into each cup
Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until edges are golden brown and filling is set
